content: hey, guys, I dont post on here much, but if you are from the so cal region, a friend of mine is trying to organize a Wheelers for the Wounded event for the weekend of May 30-31st. We are looking for volunteers and donations. Also, I know we all have friends that have and are still wounded due to the wars past and present. Please pass this on to them and if you need any information please feel free to e-mail the questions to tomrushforth@hotmail.com. Thanks, I look forward to speaking with all of you.
